segments.text: Yes , I would like to place an order for toner cartridges . We have a standing agreement with you company , so we will need the same amount as last time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me key in your information into my computer . I will pull up our records for you . Do you have an order number ? What name is the order listed under ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It should be under Leslie Smith . The number is 184796 A .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , Mr . Smith . I have an order for three cases of cartridges , it that what you would like to refill ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there the correct billing address ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , PLS post the bill to 124 Hildrod Lane , Milton County , 98830 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will send you an invoice in the next few days . Your order should be delivered before the end of the day on Monday .
segments.speaker: S1
